mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL ( NO, DRAFTER, CATEGORY_NO, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{drafter}, #{categoryNo}, SYSDATE, #{title} )
INSERT INTO LETTER_OF_APPROVAL ( NO, APPROVAL_NO, CONTENT, INSTRUCTION ) VALUES ( SEQ_LETTER_OF_APPROVAL.NEXTVAL, #{approvalNo}, #{content}, null )
mapper.select: SELECT NO, TYPE FROM LEAVE_TYPE
SELECT NO,CATEGORY FROM EXTRA_WORK_CATEGORY

SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, U.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, AC.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE, APPROVER_NO, APPROVAL_STATE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN "USER" U ON EA.DRAFTER = U.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO JOIN APPROVER A ON EA.NO = A.APPROVAL_NO WHERE APPROVER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, CATEGORY_NO, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE, CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, FORM FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}

SELECT U.NAME, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD (DAY)') AS DRAFTER_DATE, EA.NO AS EA_NO, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME FROM "USER" U JOIN ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA ON U.NO = EA.DRAFTER JOIN "RANK" R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, INSTRUCTION FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN LETTER_OF_APPROVAL LOA ON EA.NO = LOA.APPROVAL_NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}
SELECT TITLE, REASON, "FROM", "TO", TYPE_NO, TYPE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN APPLICATION_FOR_LEAVE AFL ON EA.NO = AFL.APPROVAL_NO JOIN LEAVE_TYPE LT ON AFL.TYPE_NO = LT.NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}

SELECT TITLE, REASON, "DATE", "START_TIME", "END_TIME", CATEGORY, EWC.NO AS TYPE_NO FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN APPLICATION_FOR_EXTRA_WORK AFE ON EA.NO = AFE.APPROVAL_NO JOIN EXTRA_WORK_CATEGORY EWC ON AFE.CATEGORY_NO = EWC.NO WHERE EA.NO = #{no}

SELECT U.NO AS APPROVER_NO, APPROVAL_STATE, APPROVAL_DATE, APST.STATE_NAME, U.NAME, PROFILE, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4 FROM APPROVER A JOIN "USER" U ON A.APPROVER_NO = U.NO JOIN "RANK" R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN APPROVAL_STATE APST ON A.APPROVAL_STATE = APST.NO JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO WHERE APPROVAL_NO = #{no} ORDER BY R.GRADE DESC

SELECT U.NAME, PROFILE, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4 FROM APPROVAL_CC A JOIN "USER" U ON A.CC_NO = U.NO JOIN "RANK" R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO WHERE A.NO = #{no}

SELECT APPROVAL_STATE, APPROVER_NO, NEXT_APPROVAER_NO, APPROVAL_DATE, GRADE FROM APPROVER A JOIN (SELECT "USER".NO, RANK_NO, GRADE FROM "USER" JOIN "RANK" ON "USER".RANK_NO = "RANK".NO) B ON A.APPROVER_NO = B.NO WHERE APPROVAL_NO = #{approvalNo} ORDER BY GRADE DESC
SELECT AUTHORITY FROM APPROVAL_CATEGORY WHERE NO = (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL WHERE NO = #{approvalNo})
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM APPROVER WHERE APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPROVAL_STATE = 0

SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, U.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, AC.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE, APPROVER_NO, APPROVAL_STATE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN "USER" U ON EA.DRAFTER = U.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO JOIN APPROVER A ON EA.NO = A.APPROVAL_NO WHERE APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPROVAL_STATE = 0

SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, U.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, AC.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN "USER" U ON EA.DRAFTER = U.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CC AC ON EA.NO = AC.NO WHERE CC_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT EA.NO, DRAFTER, U.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, AC.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME, REQUEST_DATE, TITLE FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL EA JOIN "USER" U ON EA.DRAFTER = U.NO JOIN APPROVAL_CATEGORY AC ON EA.CATEGORY_NO = AC.NO WHERE DRAFTER = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEAVE (NO, USER_NO, LEAVE_NO, PROXY_NO, ENROLLDATE, REASON_CONTENT, START_TIME, END_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_LEAVE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{leaveNo}, #{proxyNo}, DEFAULT, #{reasonContent}, #{startTime}, #{startTime})
